Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-SHa G10Y analog (Synthetic AMPs, XXD1, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) totemporin-SHaL: 23%, F=G=K: 15%.Chemical modification:  Y10 is a D-amino acid; C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against Gram- bacteria A. baumannii DSM 30007 (MIC 12.5 uM), E.cloacae DSM 30054 (MIC >100 uM), E.coli ATCC 8739 (MIC >100 uM), H. pylori ATCC 43504 (MIC 6.25 uM), K.pneumonia DSM 26371 (MIC >100 uM), P.aeruginosa ATCC 9027 (MIC >100 uM), Gram+ bacteria B. subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC 6.25 uM), E. faecalis DSM 2570 (MIC 12.5 uM), E. faecium DSM 20477 (MIC 12.5 uM), and S. aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC 6.25 uM).Anticancer: Breast Cancer MCF-7, Liver Cancer HepG-2, Ovarian Cancer A2780, Pancreatic Cancer MiaPaCa-2, Prostate Cancer PC-3, Skin Cancer MNT-1, Lung Cancer A549 (IC50 13.1-44.1 uM).Structure:  helical in SDS.In vitro toxicity:  normal lung fibroblast IMR-90 (IC50 38.2 uM) and normal Lung epithelium BEAS-2B (IC50 32.0 uM). Poor cell selectivity relative to cancer cells.
Literature Information.Author: Khan AI, Nazir S, Haque MNU, Maharjan R, Khan FA, Olleik H, Courvoisier-Dezord E, Maresca M, Shaheen F. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Synthesis of Second-Generation Analogs of Temporin-SHa Peptide Having Broad-Spectrum Antibacterial and Anticancer Effects
